name: Skyblock Multiplayer
description:
Skyblock multiplayer is a multiplayer game taking place in a 3D open world.
On top of the multiplayer mode, an offline version of the skyblock mode is also available to play to craft as many building as you want. You can play in multiplayer with your friends up to 200 players per server.

In a unique block world made of floating islands above the sea (the skyblock), you will be able to construct your own city in the sky with more than 40 buildings and make your own constructions with more than 60 blocks (Water, TNT, Diamond...).

Every feedback are welcome to improve this multiplayer game !
